scripts.materialize: cp -r node_modules/materialize-css/dist/* previouslyOn_app/www; cp -r node_modules/materialize-css/css/* previouslyOn_app/www/css/; cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js previouslyOn_app/www/js/jquery.min.js
scripts.start: node_modules/.bin/watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread syntax-decorators ] ] -o previouslyOn_app/www/js/index.js -v -d src/app.js
scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread syntax-decorators ] ] src/app.js | uglifyjs -cm > previouslyOn_app/www/js/index.js
scripts.build:debug: node_modules/.bin/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-object-rest-spread syntax-decorators ] ] src/app.js -d -o previouslyOn_app/www/js/index.js
